nice_to_have: Offer multilingual support for non-English speakers
Provide information on potential drug interactions with my current medications
Allow me to set preferences for reminders (e.g., text, email, app notification)
Allow me to change my payment method easily
deal_breakers: The pharmacist refused to answer my questions
I have moved and need a new pharmacy

technical: Something that works fast but also looks good
I think it should connect to my phone somehow, maybe via Bluetooth?
A system that sorts prescriptions, I guess?
non_technical: A place that everyone says is great, even if I don't really know why
Something modern but also traditional, if that makes sense
I heard it's important to have a friendly pharmacist, but I'm not sure what that means

must_meet: The prescription should be ready when I arrive, or at least within an hour, maybe?
I need the price to be reasonable, but I can't define what that means exactly
should_meet: It would be cool if they had a website, but I'm not picky about how it looks
I think they should offer some kind of reminder system, but I'm not sure how it works
nice_to_meet: If they have a loyalty program or something like that, it could be interesting
I'm not sure if I need this, but I want to know if they can answer all my questions
